game.name: COH 2 - The Western Front Armies: US Forces
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam 창작마당, Steam Cloud, 통계, 레벨 에디터 포함, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: This individual army for COH2 allows you to access all existing COH2 maps in auto-match, and play against all other existing factions in multiplayer. It can also be obtained at a discount by acquiring The Western Front Armies multiplayer standalone, where it is bundled with the OKW army.
game.shortDescriptionEn: This individual army for COH2 allows you to access all existing COH2 maps in auto-match, and play against all other existing factions in multiplayer. It can also be obtained at a discount by acquiring The Western Front Armies multiplayer standalone, where it is bundled with the OKW army.
game.developers: Relic Entertainment, Feral Interactive (Mac), Feral Interactive (Linux)
game.publishers: Relic Entertainment, Feral Interactive (Mac), Feral Interactive (Linux)

reviewHighlights.text: 초반을 어떻게 넘기는가 중요한 진영 뉴비분들은 그냥 소련이나 영국하세요. 또 제발 기본포격 유닛좀 내놔라...... 방어선 어떻게 뚫냐?
게임 나쁘지 않습니다. 스타크래프트 하던거 생각나네요. 그런데, 게임 자체에 요소가 많아서 좀 복잡한 것 같습니다. 그래도 나름 재미있습니다.
